name: Youth Homeless System Improvement Grants
objective: The objectives of the Youth Homeless System Improvement Grants (YHSIG), HUD will award approximately $25,000,000 to support communities, including but not limited to the communities assisted under the matter preceding this proviso in establishing and implementing a response system for youth homelessness or for improving their existing system.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Community Planning and Development
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
